name: Everybody's Tennis Portable
summary:
The ninth game, and second tennis spin-off, in the Everybody's Golf series. 
 
"Take the fun and excitement of Tennis anywhere in a whole new Hot Shots Tennis adventure for your PSP system. Ace, volley and smash your way through a brand new cast of Hot Shots characters. Travel around the globe unlocking exotic venues, courts and crazy Hot Shots equipment! Do you have the skills to take on the challenge? 
 
Set up a singles match or 4 player rally! 
Challenge your way to the top! 
Choose characters with style and customize them more!"

alternative_names.name: みんなのテニス ポータブル
Hot Shots Tennis: Get a Grip

esrb.synopsis: This is a tennis simulation game in which players can select an avatar, customize it with outfits, and compete in matches of tennis against other characters. Some female avatars have tight bodysuits that depict moderate cleavage, and one line judge is described as "the seductive superlady" with a profile that asks, "How long before the court is mobbed by men wanting to steal a look?" During matches it is possible for the tennis ball to hit people outside the court (dog walkers, spectators, etc.), and in one scene a character is comically thrown out of a temple.

pegi.synopsis: The content of this game is suitable for all persons.
